title: "Pot Pie" Sauce
directions: In a saucepan, over medium heat, melt the butter. Add onions and cook until soft, 5 minutes. Stir in the flour and cook for 2 minutes. Whisk in the stock, 1/2 cup at a time. Whisk until smooth.
Season with salt and pepper and throw in thyme, rosemary, and bay leaf. Bring the liquid to a boil and reduce the heat to low and cook for 30 minutes.
Remove from the heat, strain and add in the cream, celery, and carrot. The carrot and celery are added at this point to avoid having "mush" vegetables in the finished sauce. Chill.
